Reviews.Title: Awesome phone!
Reviews.Author: Angelina Palmerino
Reviews.Content: Works great and internationally which was key. The only complaint that I have so far is that the camera is not spectacular. But besides that, this phone is amazing. Incredibly fast and efficient. I have had no problems with it. I would buy it again five times over.

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
3G 850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100
Dispaly:1080 x 1920 pixels, 5.2 inches
Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, DLNA, Wi-Fi hotspot
13 MP, autofocus, optical image stabilization with LED flash
ProductInfo.Name: LG G2 13MP, 16GB, LTE Quad-Core Factory Unlocked World Mobile Phone - White
